text: Hey everyone, just looking to clarify, and it seems like the answer is `no` but just in case. It's not currently possible to put `{% if contactProperty == "X" %} <p>This text</p> {% else %} <p>This text, is different</p>{% endif %}` *in an email template*. It sounds like you just have to use rich text in the email template and use smart content, is that correct?
